thread.section_title: Devon Valley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One of my favorite places in the Western Cape
thread.title_full: One of my favorite places in the Western Cape - Review of Devon Valley Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: robert j
title: One of my favorite places in the Western Cape
text:
I have stayed at the Devon Valley Inn many times over the years and enjoy it so much.
Wonderful staff, cottage feeling great breakfasts, a beautiful outside sitting area from warm and small Bar.
If ever Iam tired on a trip from the US, I always look forward to recharging there.
My wife loved it as did my daughter and son in law.
Can't wait to get back !
